title: Rust Closures with Generic Constraints
description: In this lab, it is explained that closures in Rust use type anonymity, which requires the usage of generics when using closures as function parameters.

meta.title: Rust Closures | Type Anonymity | Generics
meta.description: Explore the concept of type anonymity in Rust closures and learn how to use generics when passing closures as function parameters.
meta.keywords: Rust, Closures, Type Anonymity, Generics, Programming Tutorials
